ar.title: AR Experience
ar.subtitle: Immerse yourself in our augmented reality features

ar.pointCamera: Point your camera at a QR code or marker
ar.menuViewDescription: View our menu items in 3D augmented reality
ar.virtualTourDescription: Take a virtual tour of our restaurant
ar.step1: Point your camera at a QR code or marker
ar.step2: Wait for the AR content to load
ar.step3: Move your device to explore the 3D content
ar.tip1: Ensure good lighting for best AR experience
ar.tip2: Keep your device steady for accurate tracking
ar.tip3: Move slowly and smoothly for better tracking
ar.tip4: Look for lighting conditions that minimize glare
ar.compatibilityDescription: AR features require compatible devices and browsers
ar.note3: Internet connection required for initial loading
